short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove anything to do with YouTube Shorts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension removals all YouTube shorts from the YouTube desktop and mobile sites.

This is a simple implementation that uses no scripting and is only activated while on YouTube.

New in version 1.42:
- Updated mobile shorts section detection
